mod.name: The Poker Player
mod.credits:
HSymbol - original game
Rita-Bernstein - ZHS translation
mod.description:
Adds a character called The Poker Player, who fights with his own rule inspired from poker.

- Adds 87 cards and 13 relics.
- Disables some base game contents which are unbalanced or confusing to the Poker Player. If you don't like this behavior, check out the mod config.

v0.8.0 (2019-04-23)
- Many balance changes.

v0.8.6 (2019-06-16)
- Changes to Super Bite card, Splitter relic, Exordium Club, other bug fixes

v0.8.7 (2019-07-02)
- Updated for v1.1 release

v0.8.9 (2019-07-14)
- Now you can see Poker Cards in library event, transform effects, Draft & Sealed Deck Custom Mod!
- Added KOR text for Harden buff.
- Fixed UI when you play Club Dance+ with Broken Clock relic.

v0.8.10 (2019-07-20)
- If you have Slay the Streamer mod enabled, the starting deck selection now contains Poker cards.

For the past patch notes, visit https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/changelog/1710999325

cards.name: Bad Joker
cards.description: Choose 1 of 2 random pokerplayer:non-Heart Poker Cards to add to your hand. It has Ethereal.

cards.name: Bad Joker+
cards.description: Choose 1 of 3 random pokerplayer:non-Heart Poker Cards to add to your hand. It has Ethereal.

cards.name: Mulligan
cards.description:
Discard any number of cards.
Draw cards until you have 5 cards in hand.

cards.name: Mulligan+
cards.description:
Discard any number of cards.
Draw cards until you have 5 cards in hand.

cards.name: Trump Strike
cards.description:
Deal 0 damage (number of Poker cards in your deck).
Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Trump Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 0 damage (number of Poker cards in your deck).
Draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Thinking Time
cards.description:
Gain 0 Block
(number of Poker cards in your deck).
Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Thinking Time+
cards.description:
Gain 0 Block
(number of Poker cards in your deck).
Draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Cloak and Diamond
cards.description:
Gain 6 Block.
Add a 4 of pokerplayer:Diamonds with Ethereal into your hand.

cards.name: Cloak and Diamond+
cards.description:
Gain 6 Block.
Add a 7 of pokerplayer:Diamonds with Ethereal into your hand.

cards.name: Clubs Club
cards.description:
Draw 1 card.
Deal 10 damage for each pokerplayer:Club in your hand.

cards.name: Clubs Club+
cards.description:
Draw 1 card.
Deal 13 damage for each pokerplayer:Club in your hand.

cards.name: Configure
cards.description: Draw 2 cards. Put a card from your hand onto the top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Configure+
cards.description: Draw 2 cards. Put a card from your hand onto the top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Dart Throw
cards.description:
Deal 16 damage.
Enemy loses 2 Strength this turn.

cards.name: Dart Throw+
cards.description:
Deal 20 damage.
Enemy loses 3 Strength this turn.

cards.name: Diamond Strike
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Add a 4 of pokerplayer:Diamonds with Ethereal into your hand.

cards.name: Diamond Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage.
Add a 6 of pokerplayer:Diamonds with Ethereal into your hand.

cards.name: Magic Trick
cards.description:
Draw until you have 7 cards in hand.
Discard 2 cards.

cards.name: Magic Trick+
cards.description:
Draw until you have 8 cards in hand.
Discard 3 cards.

cards.name: Raise
cards.description:
Draw 1 card.
You may increase the pokerplayer:Rank of one Poker Card by 1.

cards.name: Raise+
cards.description:
Draw 1 card.
You may increase the pokerplayer:Rank of one Poker Card by 1.

cards.name: Spade Strike
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Add a 4 of pokerplayer:Spades with Ethereal into your hand.

cards.name: Spade Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Add a 6 of pokerplayer:Spades with Ethereal into your hand.

cards.name: Card Printer <3>
cards.description: At the start of your turn, shuffle a pokerplayer:non-Heart, pokerplayer:Rank 3 Poker card to your draw pile. Can be upgraded 7 times.

cards.name: Card Printer <4>
cards.description: At the start of your turn, shuffle a pokerplayer:non-Heart, pokerplayer:Rank 4 Poker card to your draw pile. Can be upgraded 6 more times.

cards.name: Card Printer <4>
cards.description: At the start of your turn, shuffle a pokerplayer:non-Heart, pokerplayer:Rank 4 Poker card to your draw pile. Can be upgraded 6 more times.

cards.name: Club Dance
cards.description: Choose 1 of 3 random pokerplayer:Clubs to add to your hand. It has Ethereal.

cards.name: Club Dance+
cards.description: Choose 1 of 5 random pokerplayer:Clubs to add to your hand. It has Ethereal.

cards.name: Club Shade
cards.description: Your pokerplayer:Clubs give you 2 Block as an additional pokerplayer:Showdown effect.

cards.name: Club Shade+
cards.description:
Draw 1 card.
Your pokerplayer:Clubs give you 2 Block as an additional pokerplayer:Showdown effect.

cards.name: Club Strike
cards.description:
Deal 15 damage.
Add a 6 of pokerplayer:Clubs with Ethereal into your hand.

cards.name: Club Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 18 damage.
Add a 7 of pokerplayer:Clubs with Ethereal into your hand.

cards.name: Damn Straight
cards.description:
pokerplayer:Showdown bonus from Straight is doubled.
(200% -> 400%)

cards.name: Damn Straight+
cards.description:
Draw 1 card.
pokerplayer:Showdown bonus from Straight is doubled.
(200% -> 400%)

cards.name: Extraction
cards.description: Exhaust a card from your hand. If it is a Poker card, gain energy equal to its pokerplayer:Rank.

cards.name: Extraction+
cards.description: Exhaust a card from your hand. If it is a Poker card, gain energy equal to its pokerplayer:Rank.

cards.name: Fill the Pot
cards.description:
Put 3 random non-Poker cards from your draw pile into your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Fill the Pot+
cards.description:
Put 4 random non-Poker cards from your draw pile into your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Flying Card
cards.description: Gain 3 Block and deal 3 damage for each card generated in this combat.

cards.name: Flying Card+
cards.description: Gain 4 Block and deal 4 damage for each card generated in this combat.

cards.name: Harden
cards.description: Your pokerplayer:Spades give you 2 Block next turn as an additional pokerplayer:Showdown effect.

cards.name: Harden+
cards.description:
Draw 1 card.
Your pokerplayer:Spades give you 2 Block next turn as an additional pokerplayer:Showdown effect.

cards.name: Heart Strike
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Add a 3 of pokerplayer:Hearts into your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Heart Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Add a 5 of pokerplayer:Hearts into your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Hidden Card
cards.description: Fetch a Poker Card from your discard pile.

cards.name: Hidden Card+
cards.description: Fetch a Poker Card from your discard pile. Gain Block equal to its pokerplayer:Rank.

cards.name: Hot Shot Cut
cards.description:
Exhaust all Poker cards in your hand.
Deal 10 damage to a random enemy for each of them.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Hot Shot Cut+
cards.description:
Exhaust all Poker cards in your hand.
Deal 13 damage to a random enemy for each of them.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Jack of Spades
cards.description:
Gain 11 Block.
Apply 11 Weak.
Apply 11 Vulnerable.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Jack of Spades+
cards.description:
Gain 11 Block.
Apply 11 Weak.
Apply 11 Vulnerable.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Manipulation
cards.description:
For the next X turns, gain [E] [E].
You may increase the pokerplayer:Rank of one Poker Card by X.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Manipulation+
cards.description:
For the next X turns, gain [E] [E].
You may increase the pokerplayer:Rank of one Poker Card by X.

cards.name: Overdeal
cards.description:
Deal X damage.
Add X random Poker cards into your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Overdeal+
cards.description:
Deal X+1 damage. Add X+1 random Poker cards into your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Poor Copy
cards.description: Choose One: Draw 1 card; or copy a Poker card from your hand and reduce the pokerplayer:Rank of the copy by 1.

cards.name: Poor Copy+
cards.description: Choose One: Draw 1 card; or copy a Poker card from your hand and reduce the pokerplayer:Rank of the copy by 1.

cards.name: Risky Bet
cards.description: Discard a card and draw a card. If they are both Poker cards with the same pokerplayer:Suit, gain [E] and draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Risky Bet+
cards.description: Discard a card and draw a card. If they are both Poker cards with the same pokerplayer:Suit, gain [E] and draw 4 cards.

cards.name: Second Chance
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Draw 1 card.
Repeat until you have 5 cards in hand.

cards.name: Second Chance+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Draw 1 card.
Repeat until you have 5 cards in hand.

cards.name: Sharpen
cards.description: Your pokerplayer:Diamonds deal 2 more damage during pokerplayer:Showdown.

cards.name: Sharpen+
cards.description:
Draw 1 card.
Your pokerplayer:Diamonds deal 2 more damage during pokerplayer:Showdown.

cards.name: Duplicate
cards.description: Choose a Poker Card from your hand. Add a copy of that card into your hand.

cards.name: Duplicate+
cards.description: Choose a Poker Card from your hand. Add a copy of that card into your hand.

cards.name: Fake Symbols
cards.description: You score a Flush if you have 4 or more Poker Cards with same pokerplayer:Suit during pokerplayer:Showdown.

cards.name: Fake Symbols+
cards.description:
Draw 1 card.
You score a Flush if you have 4 or more Poker Cards with same pokerplayer:Suit during pokerplayer:Showdown.

cards.name: Flip Table
cards.description:
Deal 20 damage.
Gain 3 Strength.
Gain 3 Dexterity.

cards.name: Flip Table+
cards.description:
Deal 24 damage.
Gain 4 Strength.
Gain 4 Dexterity.

cards.name: Gambler Form
cards.description: If you score Two Pair or better, the pokerplayer:Showdown effect of all Poker cards are increased by 3 .

cards.name: Gambler Form+
cards.description:
Draw 1 card.
If you score Two Pair or better, the pokerplayer:Showdown effect of all Poker cards are increased by 3 .

cards.name: It's Showtime!
cards.description:
Draw 1 card.
Trigger the pokerplayer:Showdown.
Exhaust.

cards.name: It's Showtime!+
cards.description:
Draw 1 card.
Trigger the pokerplayer:Showdown.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Promotion
cards.description:
Raise the pokerplayer:Rank of ALL Poker cards by 1 for the rest of combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Promotion+
cards.description:
Raise the pokerplayer:Rank of ALL Poker cards by 1 for the rest of combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Royal Strike
cards.description:
Discard a Poker card.
Deal damage equal to 5 times the pokerplayer:Rank of it.

cards.name: Royal Strike+
cards.description:
Discard a Poker card.
Deal damage equal to 6 times the pokerplayer:Rank of it.

cards.name: Stacked Deck
cards.description: At the start of your turn, Look at the top 2 cards of your draw pile and discard any of them.

cards.name: Stacked Deck+
cards.description:
Draw 1 card.
At the start of your turn, Look at the top 2 cards of your draw pile and discard any of them.

cards.name: The Die is Cast!
cards.description:
Throw a die.
Choose any number of Poker cards in your hand to change their pokerplayer:Rank to the die roll.

cards.name: The Die is Cast!+
cards.description:
Throw a loaded die.
Choose any number of Poker cards in your hand to change their pokerplayer:Rank to the die roll.

cards.name: Variety Attack
cards.description: Deal 3 damage to ALL enemies. Damage is doubled for each unique pokerplayer:Suit of Poker Cards in your hand.

cards.name: Variety Attack+
cards.description: Deal 4 damage to ALL enemies. Damage is doubled for each unique pokerplayer:Suit of Poker Cards in your hand.

cards.name: Waste Collection
cards.description:
Fetch 3 Poker cards ranked 3 or less from your draw pile. They have double pokerplayer:Showdown Effect for this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Waste Collection+
cards.description:
Fetch 4 Poker cards ranked 3 or less from your draw pile. They have double pokerplayer:Showdown Effect for this combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Wild Card
cards.description:
Choose 1 from ALL Poker Cards to add into your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Wild Card+
cards.description:
Choose 1 from ALL Poker Cards to add into your hand.
Exhaust.

relics.name: Deck Case
relics.description: Each combat, the first 6 Status cards entering your deck are exhausted.
relics.flavorText: Having this calms you down and help you quickly recover from bad conditions.

relics.name: Bottled Poker
relics.description: Upon pick up, choose up to 3 Poker cards. Start each combat with these cards in your hand.
relics.flavorText: You feel nostalgic while looking at this bottle.

relics.name: Splitter
relics.description: Whenever you play a Poker card pokerplayer:ranked 3 or less, deal 5 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: The magical abilities of lower Poker cards shine!

relics.name: Broken Clock
relics.description: When you would add a Poker Card into your hand, you may choose to draw 1 card instead.
relics.flavorText: Only you know that this clock moves slowly.

relics.name: Club Pass
relics.description: Whenever you play a card containing "Club", your pokerplayer:Clubs deal 1 more damage until the end of combat.
relics.flavorText: Of course it's the Club of Joking.

relics.name: Cool Box
relics.description: At the start of each combat, add a 10 of pokerplayer:Spades with Ethereal into your hand. It costs 0.
relics.flavorText: Contains tools for cooling your cool head.

relics.name: Fair License
relics.description: If you do not play any Poker cards during your turn and score any Poker hand, gain [E] [E] next turn.

relics.name: Energetic Bat
relics.description: Whenever you play a Strike card, gain [E] .
relics.flavorText: This lively bat strikes enemies before you even realize it.

relics.name: Jackpot Machine
relics.description: If you have 3 or more Poker Cards with pokerplayer:Rank 7 during Showdown, deal 52 damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Looks like a jackpot machine, but actually a calendar.

relics.name: Stuffed Pocket
relics.description: You receive the pokerplayer:Showdown effects from all Poker cards in your hand instead of max. 5 cards.
relics.flavorText: Warning: Poker hand might be determined unexpectedly.

relics.name: Ace Card
relics.description: pokerplayer:Rank 1 Poker Cards cost 0 and gives you 2 Block when played.
relics.flavorText: The single card to trump the opponents.

relics.name: Pen and Eraser
relics.description: Upon pickup, raise the pokerplayer:Rank of two random Poker Cards by 3.
relics.flavorText: The best tool for "modifying" poker cards.

relics.name: Pendant of Escape
relics.description:
Once per combat, right click to activate.
Discard your hand and draw 5 cards.
relics.flavorText: Touch this if you feel hopeless.
